text: "If I Were You" is a song written by Kasey Chambers, produced by Nash Chambers for Chambers's second album Barricades & Brickwalls. It was released as the album's fifth and final single in 2002. It peaked at number 32. ==Track listing== # "If I Were You" - 4:10 # "Nullarbor Song" (Live) \- 4:52 # "Changed The Locks" (Live) \- 4:20 # "Million Tears" (Live) \- 5:08 * Tracks 2 to 4 taken from the DVD Kasey Chambers - Behind The Barricades. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" !Chart (2002) !Peak position |- |} ==References== Category:2002 singles Category:Kasey Chambers songs Category:2001 songs Category:EMI Records singles
title: If I Were You (Kasey Chambers song)
